static void edu.ou.asgbook.segmentation.RegionGrowing.growRegion ( int  x,
int  y,
LatLonGrid  data,
int  thresh,
LatLonGrid  label,
int  currLabel 
) [static] 

00019                                                                                                              {
00020         final int junk = 0; // data value not needed for region growing
00021         final int UNSET = 0;
00022         List<Pixel> stack = new ArrayList<Pixel>();
00023         stack.add(new Pixel(x,y,junk));
00024         while (stack.size() > 0){
00025             Pixel p = stack.remove(stack.size()-1);
00026             label.setValue(p.getX(), p.getY(), currLabel);
00027             for (int i=p.getX()-1; i <= p.getX()+1; ++i){
00028                 for (int j=p.getY()-1; j <= p.getY()+1; ++j){
00029                     if (data.isValid(i, j) && data.getValue(i,j) > thresh && label.getValue(i,j) == UNSET){
00030                         stack.add(new Pixel(i,j,junk));
00031                     }
00032                 }
00033             }
00034         }
00035     }
